terms.title: Mobile Application Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.purpose: These terms and conditions of use are intended to define how NeuroTech makes available this mobile application, and the services available to the benefit of the user. By using the NeuroTech mobile application, the user accepts without reservation these terms and conditions of use.
articleOneBody: This mobile application aims to allow spectators of the concert "Le Cerveau Enchanté" to interact in real-time on various activities proposed in connection with the program of the concert. The application is edited and distributed by NeuroTech.
articleTwoBody: The use of information and documents available on this application are under the responsibility of the user, who assumes all the consequences.
articleTwoSectionOneBody: The mobile app works with mobile devices using Apple iOS and Android operating systems. NeuroTech does not guarantee the absence of bugs, inaccuracies, errors, or other harmful elements. The mobile application is dependent on the mobile network and internet to operate. Therefore, the alert system can only work subject to the availability of the network. NeuroTech declines any responsibility in case of unavailability of the network.

terms.articleFourTitle: Article 4 - Processing and publication of personal anonymized data
articleFourBody: Data collected via the application are anonymized and hosted on a server at the Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Vaudois.

The collected data are the demographic data as requested on the registration form, as well as the answers to the questions and various activities proposed in the application. There is no collection of medical data.

The collected anonymized data may be used and incorporated in its full form in future versions of this application and other applications, including radio and television broadcast, online publication and virtual reality scenarios – in scientific, commercial and non-profit domains.
terms.articleFiveTitle: Article 5 – Scientific use of personal anonymized data
articleFiveBody: The user agrees that the collected anonymized data as described above may be used for research and scientific publications, and made available for other researchers through online data repositories.
terms.articleSixTitle: Article 6 - Right of access, modification and deletion of collected data
articleSixBody: According to the Federal Data Protection Act (SDG) 235.1 dated 19 June 1992 (status as of March 1, 2019), upon written request, the user has the right to access, modify, correct, oppose and delete his/her data collected on this application.

These rights are strictly personal and can only be exercised by the user for data concerning him/her, or concerning another user of which he/she is the legal representative. The user can exercise these rights, by sending an e-mail to the address info@neurotech.healthcare or by sending a letter to the following address:

The user must specify his last name, first name, email address, and his user ID. The user must attach to his request any element allowing to identify him/her with certainty. The reply will be sent within a maximum of two (2) months following receipt of the request.
